name: Bulk Page Maker Light
author: Sapayth H.

sections.description:
Bulk Page Maker is a light plugin for WordPress pages and posts creation. You can make a thousands of pages or posts by a single click with Bulk Page maker. Activate and enjoy Bulk Page Maker with:
– Type selection option (Page or Post)
– Status selection option (Publish, Pending, Draft etc.)
– Comment status (Open or Closed)
– Select parent page
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • PHP 7.0 or higher is recommended
  • MySQL 5.1 or higher is recommended

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option — WordPress will handles the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Bulk Page Maker, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”

In the search field type “Bulk Page Maker”, then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve the plugin, you can install it by Clicking “Install Now” and WordPress will take it from there.

Manual installation

Manual installation method requires downloading the Bulk Page Maker plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Updating

Automatic updates should work smoothly, I still recommend you back up your site.

short_description: Bulk Page Maker is a light plugin to make multiple pages or posts on a single click.
